## mapToAscii() function

Renders a map of squares to characters on an ASCII board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mapToAscii(charMap: Readonly<Partial<Record<Square, string>>>, eol?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  charMap | Readonly&lt;Partial&lt;Record&lt;[Square](./chess.ts.square.md)<!-- -->, string&gt;&gt;&gt; | Map of squares to characters |
|  eol | string | _(Optional)_ End of line character |

**Returns:**

string
